creator: Egardia
descriptionHtml:
Egardia® is an intelligent all-in-one wireless alarm system designed to protect your home against burglary, fire and water damage. You and your designated contacts are instantly notified by SMS, telephone or email in the event of an alarm.

With the Egardia® App you can easily control your Alarm System and see your camera images from anywhere using your mobile phone. The App allows you to switch your alarm system and lights on and off. You can also see live video from home and the recording that where made during an alarm event.

Try the demo account:
Username: egardia7
Password: egardia7
descriptionShort: With the Egardia App you can control your Egardia Alarm System from anywhere.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New: Its now possible to add and delete contacts
New: Also residents can now be added and deleted
New: Update security question and answers for residents
New: Show a nice map when editing your home address
Improvement: Unsubscribe user from push messages after logout
Under the hood improvement: Optimised logout mechanism
Improvement: Adding error messages for the Residents page

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

title: Egardia Alarm System App

creator: Egardia
descriptionHtml:
Egardia® is an intelligent all-in-one wireless alarm system designed to protect your home against burglary, fire and water damage. You and your designated contacts are instantly notified by SMS, telephone or email in the event of an alarm.

With the Egardia® App you can easily control your Alarm System and see your camera images from anywhere using your mobile phone. The App allows you to switch your alarm system and lights on and off. You can also see live video from home and the recording that where made during an alarm event.

Try the demo account:
Username: egardia7
Password: egardia7
descriptionShort: With the Egardia App you can control your Egardia Alarm System from anywhere.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New function: Gateway configuration options and weekly scheduler.

It is now possible to adjust the settings of the gateway in the app. You can now also turn the siren and confirmation beep tone on/off via the app.

In addition, you can now set a weekly schedule for your Gateway. Are you always leaving and returning at the same time? Or do you always go to bed at the same time? With the week schedule, you can ensure that the alarm system is always (partially) activated at a preset time!

New: You can now edit Human Detection Sensitivity to AI camera settings.
New: You can now view video recordings snapshots
New: You can now set Human detection push notification

title: Egardia Alarm System App

creator: Egardia
descriptionHtml:
Egardia® is an intelligent all-in-one wireless alarm system designed to protect your home against burglary, fire and water damage. You and your designated contacts are instantly notified by SMS, telephone or email in the event of an alarm.

With the Egardia® App you can easily control your Alarm System and see your camera images from anywhere using your mobile phone. The App allows you to switch your alarm system and lights on and off. You can also see live video from home and the recording that where made during an alarm event.

Try the demo account:
Username: egardia7
Password: egardia7
descriptionShort: With the Egardia App you can control your Egardia Alarm System from anywhere.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fixed: Compatibility issues with old Android versions

In addition, we fixed several minor issues.
